title: New: Clu – Moonrunner (Feat. Gemma Dunlovely)
body: It’s been a minute since we last heard from Irish duo **Clu** (**Sean Cooley** and **Kevin Freeney**), with their gorgeous video for [Evening Ever](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16581-video-clu-evening-ever/) marking them out as a serious talent to keep an ear out for. Part of the blossoming Irish electronic scene sure to cause waves in 2013, their new track _Moonrunner_, featuring the vocal talents of **Gemma Dunlovely**, steps up the game yet again. Demanding repeated listens, it’s a track that really embeds itself in the consciousness, with it’s slick R&B vibes and intricate percussion, 2013 better watch out.
